Posted By: TenMatys (5/12/2013 3:40:11 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: A fun thing to do is to combo this with [Obzedat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Obzedat) and [Orzhov Charm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Orzhov Charm). Activate the second ability of the [Vizkopa Guildmage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vizkopa Guildmage), hopefully have [Exquisite Blood](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Exquisite Blood) out, and then put this on Obzedat when Obzedat comes back in. Attack in the air for six, then use Orzhov Charm to bounce Obzedat and this card back to your hand. Then replay Obzedat and in one turn, you've probably taken fourteen or more life from your opponent.
posts.html:
A fun thing to do is to combo this with Obzedat and Orzhov Charm. Activate the second ability of the Vizkopa Guildmage, hopefully have Exquisite Blood out, and then put this on Obzedat when Obzedat comes back in. Attack in the air for six, then use Orzhov Charm to bounce Obzedat and this card back to your hand. Then replay Obzedat and in one turn, you've probably taken fourteen or more life from your opponent.

posts.post_content: This is a great sideboard card for big creature decks like Golgari. Attached to a [Deadbridge Golaith](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Deadbridge Golaith) or something, you would gain a devastating amount of life against RDW or Burn. And it gives flying, which is perfect since green tends to be low on flying defense, so you're killing two birds with one stone - literally.
posts.html:

And it gives flying, which is perfect since green tends to be low on flying defense, so you're killing two birds with one stone - literally.
